SystemColumn.Formula: "File #" & [File No.] & " / Category: " & [Category] & " / Status: " & [Status] & IF( [Status] <> "Closed ", IF([Sub-state] <> NULL, " - " & [Sub-state]) & IF([Sub-state] = "Workload Issue", " - " & [Workload Issue]) )

Column.Name: Category
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND([Phase]= "Assessment Phase", ISNULL($thisValue)), "Category is a mandatory field for Assessment Phase", TRUE )

Column.Name: Amount
Column.Formula:
IF( [Transfer In/Out] = "Transfer In", 0,
[Amount] )
Column.DefaultValueFormula: DB_LOOKUP("Application Fee", "Application Fee", HASH("LineNumber", 1, "Type", "Full Application Fee"))

Column.Name: Rep First Name
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND([Payment Method]= "Portal", $thisValue!= NULL()), TRUE, [Payment Method]<> "Portal", TRUE, FALSE )

Column.Name: Rep Family Name
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND([Payment Method]= "Portal", $thisValue!= NULL()), TRUE, [Payment Method]<> "Portal", TRUE, FALSE )

Column.Name: Portal Ref
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND([Payment Method]= "Portal", $thisValue!= NULL()), TRUE, [Payment Method]<> "Portal", TRUE, FALSE )

Column.Name: Processing Days
Column.Formula:
LET $days := HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Default Processing Days"); LET $filter := HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Processing Period Filter");
RETURN IF( OR( [Date of Decision] = NULL(), [Date Valid] = NULL() ), NULL(),
$filter = "Excluding Weekends", WORKDAYSBETWEEN( [Date Valid], [Date of Decision] ) + 1,
$filter = "Including Weekends", [Date of Decision] - [Date Valid] )

Column.Name: Processing Days Category
Column.Formula:
LET $calculation := IF( [Processing Days] <= 30, "1 - 30 days", AND([Processing Days] > 30, [Processing Days] <= 45), "30 - 45 days", ">= 46 days" );
RETURN IF( [Processing Days]>0, $calculation, NULL() )

Column.Name: Reason Matter Processed Outside Time Frame
Page
Column.Formula: IF( [Page] = "None", NULL, [Page] )

Column.Name: Access Payment Type
Access Charge Balance
Process Accessible
Process Data
Process Completion Map
Line Processes
Column.Formula: HASH_KEYS([Process Data])

Column.Name: This Stage Process List
Individual Display Name in Role
Column.Formula: IF( [Role is not a System User]#[LineNumber] == TRUE, [Individual in Role], EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([Individual in Role]) )

Column.Name: Role
Individual in Role
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( 1 = 1, "No",
DB_LOOKUPALL( "Individual in Role", [EFormType], "[RecordID] = " & [RecordID] & " AND " & "[Individual in Role] IS NOT EMPTY" ) <> EACH [Individual in Role], "Roles have been changed while viewing record, please reload the record to do a reallocation" )
Column.Formula:
IF( ISBLANK([Username in Role]), [Person in Role],
ISBLANK([Person in Role]), [Username in Role],
COALESCE([Username in Role], [Person in Role]) )

Column.Name: Role is not a System User
Change of Role Status
Change of Role RecordID
Change of Role Data
Assigned Officer
Column.Formula: [Individual in Role]

Column.Name: Assigned Officer Name
Column.Formula: [Individual Display Name in Role]

Column.Name: EFormType and RecordID
Column.Formula: ARRAY([EFormType], [RecordID])

Column.Name: TEMP - Related Information Request RecordID
Global Settings
Information Request Settings
Mail Merge Options - Document Selection
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], ARRAY_FIRST([Mail Merge Options]))

Column.Name: Mail Merge Options
Column.Formula: HASH_GET( [All Mail Merge Options], [Mail Merge Purpose] )

Column.Name: Mail Merge Purpose
All Mail Merge Options
Show Emails
Status Description
Column.Formula: [Status] & IF( [Status] <> "Closed ", IF([Sub-state] <> NULL, " - " & [Sub-state]) & IF([Sub-state] = "Workload Issue", " - " & [Workload Issue]) )

Column.Name: Notes Processor
Manually Specified File No.
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( ISBLANK([Manually Specified File No.]), "Contract Number cannot be blank",
ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST(DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Information Request", HASH("File No.", [Manually Specified File No.]) ))) > 0, "File No. in use" )

Column.Name: Plain Text Scope of Request
Trimmed Scope of Request
Documents Attached
Column.Formula: IF( [Documents Attached] = NULL, OR( ARRAY_LENGTH(EBMS_GET_ATTACHMENTS(EFormType, RecordID, "Freedom of Information Request Documents")) > 0, ARRAY_LENGTH(EBMS_GET_ATTACHMENTS(EFormType, RecordID, "")) > 0 ), [Documents Attached] )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Parent Chain
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Parent Chain")

Column.Name: Applicant Name - Select
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Applicant Name - Select], [Applicant Name])

Column.Name: Section Transfer
Column.Formula: IF( OR( [Section 18 transfer] = "Yes", [Section 16 Transfer] = "Yes" ), "Yes", "No" )

Column.Name: Unique Reference
Column.Formula: IF( ISBLANK([Unique Reference]), NEWUUID(), [Unique Reference] )

Column.Name: Reference Line Exists
Column.Formula: IF( [Assessment Reference Name] <> NULL(), TRUE, [Reference Line Exists] )

Column.Name: Assessment Reference RecordID
Column.Formula: IF( [Assessment Reference RecordID] = NULL, DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Document Upload", "[Unique Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Unique Reference]#[LineNumber]) ), [Assessment Reference RecordID] )

Column.Name: Document Attached to Reference
Column.Formula:
LET $attached := IF( [Document Attached to Reference] <> TRUE, DB_LOOKUP( "Document Attached", "Document Upload", HASH("RecordID", [Assessment Reference RecordID]) ), [Document Attached to Reference] );
RETURN ARRAY_INDEXOF( ARRAY( NOT(ISBLANK([Assessment Reference Location]#[LineNumber])), $attached ), TRUE ) > 0

Group.Name: Further Freedom of Information File No.

Mapping.LocalColumnName: Further Freedom of Information File No.

MergeField.Name: Assessment References Data
Consultation Data
MergeField.Formula:
LET $data := DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY( "Consultant", "Consultation Start Date", "Consultation Completion Date", "Consultant Response", "Decision Maker", "Decision" ), "Information Request Consultation", "[LineNumber] = 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) );
RETURN $data

MergeField.Name: Exemption Data
Regions
MergeField.Formula: IF( ARRAY_LENGTH([Regions of Service]) > 1, ARRAY_JOIN([Regions of Service], ", "), ARRAY_FIRST([Regions of Service]) )

Reply By Date
MergeField.Formula: LET $date := DATEADD("day", 8, TODAY()); RETURN DATEFORMAT($date, "dd MMMM yyyy")

MergeField.Name: Deposit Reply By Date
MergeField.Formula: LET $date := DATEADD("day", 60, TODAY()); RETURN DATEFORMAT($date, "dd MMMM yyyy")

Information.Text:
Auto-populated value is determined based on your system settings. Contact an administrator if this needs to be adjusted. An administrator also has capability to overwrite the value in case of an exception.
In 'Transfer in' then amount will be $0.

Amount saved compared to a full fee amount. E.g. If paying a 'Reduced' fee then the reduced amount is the difference between a full fee and a reduced fee.
If the entire value is 'waived' then the 'Amount Reduced' is equal to the 'Amount'.

"records/Mail%20Merge%20Template/" & DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Context EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) & " AND [Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Mail Merge Purpose]) )

"This will generate a " & LOWER([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " document that includes details of this " & LOWER([EFormType]) & "."

"This will generate a " & LOWER([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " document that includes details of this " & LOWER([EFormType]) & "."

Binding.Expression: AND( [Mail Merge Options - Document Selection] <> NULL, HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], "FileName") <> [Mail Merge Purpose] )
IF( ISBLANK([Individual Display Name in Role]), "Allocate", "Reallocate" )
AND( OR( [Sourcing ID] <> NULL, [Procurement Plan ID] <> NULL ), [Change of Role RecordID] == NULL() )
AND( OR( [Sourcing ID] <> NULL, [Procurement Plan ID] <> NULL ), [Change of Role RecordID] <> NULL() )

LET $list := ARRAY_CONCAT( "File Notes", IF([Process Required?] = "Yes", "Application Fee Notes"), "Closure Notes" );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($list, $(i, item) $item <> NULL)
ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0

RichLabel.Text:
<html>
<head>
	<title></title>
</head>
<body>
<style type="text/css">/* CSS talk bubble */
.talk-bubble {
	margin: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
	width: 200px;
	height: auto;
	background-color: lightyellow;
}
.border{
  border: 8px solid #666;
}
.round{
  border-radius: 30px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 30px;
	-moz-border-radius: 30px;

}

/* Right triangle placed top left flush. */
.tri-right.border.left-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, left side slightly down */
.tri-right.border.left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 30px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 38px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 30px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 38px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}
/*
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -8px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 0px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, right side slightly down*/
.tri-right.border.right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/* Right triangle placed top right flush. */
.tri-right.border.right-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.right-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* talk bubble contents */
.talktext{
  padding: 1em;
	text-align: left;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
.talktext p{
  /* remove webkit p margins */
  -webkit-margin-before: 0em;
  -webkit-margin-after: 0em;
}
</style>
</body>
</html>

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula: HASH( "Show Actions", TRUE, "Show Miscellaneous Actions", TRUE, "Show Follow Ups", TRUE, "Show Emails", TRUE, "Show Extensions", TRUE, "Show Escalations", TRUE, "Show EDRMS References", TRUE )
HASH( "Show Actions", FALSE, "Show Miscellaneous Actions", FALSE, "Show Follow Ups", FALSE, "Show Emails", FALSE, "Show Extensions", FALSE, "Show Escalations", FALSE, "Show EDRMS References", FALSE )

OR( HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Correspondence Tracking") = "Automatic Email Capture Enabled", HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Outgoing Emails") = "Email Sending Enabled" )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Process Required?] <> "Yes" )

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula: HASH( "Show Actions", TRUE, "Show Miscellaneous Actions", TRUE, "Show Follow Ups", TRUE, "Show Emails", TRUE, "Show Extensions", TRUE, "Show Escalations", TRUE, "Show EDRMS References", TRUE )
HASH( "Show Actions", FALSE, "Show Miscellaneous Actions", FALSE, "Show Follow Ups", FALSE, "Show Emails", FALSE, "Show Extensions", FALSE, "Show Escalations", FALSE, "Show EDRMS References", FALSE )

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET([Global Settings], "External EDRMS") = TRUE
OR( HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Correspondence Tracking") = "Automatic Email Capture Enabled", HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Outgoing Emails") = "Email Sending Enabled" )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Process Required?] = "Yes" )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Show Actions] = TRUE )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Show Miscellaneous Actions] = TRUE )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Show Follow Ups] = TRUE )
HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Outgoing Emails") = "Email Sending Enabled"

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula: HASH( "Source", [EFormType]&" #"&[RecordID], "Source EFormType", [EFormType], "Source RecordID", [RecordID], "Email Type", "Incoming", "Manually Added", TRUE )

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET([Information Request Settings], "Correspondence Tracking") = "Automatic Email Capture Enabled"
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Show Emails] = TRUE )
AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Show Escalations] = TRUE )

"
"

AND( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Visible Steps], "Tracking") > 0, [Process Required?] = "Yes", [Show Extensions] = TRUE )

"records/Mail%20Merge%20Template/" & DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Context EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) & " AND [Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Mail Merge Purpose]) )
"This will generate a " & LOWER([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " document that includes details of this " & LOWER([EFormType]) & "."

RecordFile.RecordIDFormula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Mail Merge Template", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1" & " AND [Reference] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Mail Merge Purpose]) & " AND [Context EFormType] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([EFormType]) )

Binding.Expression: AND( [Mail Merge Options - Document Selection] <> NULL, HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], "FileName") <> [Mail Merge Purpose] )
"Document Generation - " & [Mail Merge Purpose]#7

Event.Name: Add System Update to File Notes

FieldEntry.Formula: LET $newUpdate := ARRAY( ROLE("system"), NOW(), "Status updated: " & "" & HTMLENCODE(loaded.[Status Description]) & " -> " & "" & HTMLENCODE([Status Description]) & "" ); RETURN ARRAY_CONCAT( [Notes], ARRAY($newUpdate) )
